item.description:
Have you heard that the Musical Chairs World Championship is coming to Amesbury Sports Park???  Want to go but don't want to compete in the event?  Problem is they aren't selling any tickets into the event, but what's the next best way to get in........

Volunteering at the event to help out!!!!

 

NOTE: I do not know exactly what we will be doing at the event.  All I do know is to volunteer at this event go to this site http://musicalchairswc.com/volunteer/ and fill out the information on the page.  You will get an email saying that they received your information, and watch your email because as the date gets closer they will send out another email stating what you will be doing the day of the event AND (hopefully) all the other information that you will need to know, including time, when to show up etc.....

IF you reply yes to this event that means that you HAVE gone on the above website and fill out the information to attend this event.

 

I have the time set for 10:00am but not sure what time slot we will be volunteering.  When you get the email saying what they want you to be doing come back to the site and let us know, so we can look for each other.

This should be a blast!!!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: Not sure we have to see what we will be doing.
item.name: A different kind of volunteering event.... see event description
